description:
The topography of the highlands in Africa, N. America and S. America TP is modified by setting surface elevations to 500m. 
Minimum number of integrations is 1.
long_name: AMIP SSTs with highland elevations in Africa, North America and South America capped at 500m
rationale: To understand the combined thermal and mechanical forcing of other plateaus except the TIP.

requirements.description: Historical, Recent past, since satellite observations have been available
requirements.label: 1979-2013 36yrs

requirements.description: Modify the topography of the highlands in Africa, N. America and S. America TP in the model by setting surface elevations to 500m, with the surface properties unchanged.
requirements.label: Highlands500

requirements.description: AMIP sea surface temperature boundary conditions derived from observational data.
requirements.keywords: AMIP, Sea surface temperature, AMIP, climate, modelling, SST, prescribed
requirements.label: AMIP SST

requirements.description: AMIP sea ice boundary conditions derived from observational data.
requirements.keywords: AMIP, Sea Ice, climate, modelling, AMIP, ipcc, seaIce, prescribed
requirements.label: AMIP SIC

requirements.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
requirements.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: Historical Land Use

requirements.description: The stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

requirements.description: Solar forcing of the Earth system consistent with historical observations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Solar, Forcing, SSI, TSI, Proton Forcing, Electron Forcing
requirements.label: Historical Solar Forcing

requirements.canonical_name: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations
requirements.description: An ozone concentration database encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
requirements.keywords: Historical, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least one simulation
requirements.keywords: minimum 1, at least 1, ensemble, run, simulation
requirements.label: MinimumOne

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
